title: Peach Bloom Color Blossoming Lip & Cheek Tint
description: Color Blossoming Lip & Cheek Tint Details HOW TO Ingredients WHAT IS IT? Give your cheeks a fresh glow with this color adapting, lighter-than-air gel blush that blossoms based on your unique body chemistry to create a custom flush of color. Enriched with Manuka honey and marshmallow extract, this nourishing formula glides on for a subtle stained glass skin effect. Sheer blossoming blush that adjusts to your own pH. WHAT ELSE DO YOU NEED TO KNOW? Stain-effect gel blush Naturally flushed, glossy finish Easy to blend Doesn't disturb makeup Non-sticky formula Pigments react to skin's pH for a unique result Perfectly suited or every complexion Provides a "glass-like" skin result Apply 1 to 3 dots of Peach Bloom on apples of cheeks and blend by tapping with clean fingertips or a sponge. Layer for color intensity! Pro-Tip: Blend quickly before pigments react with the skin's pH! Peach Bloom Color Blossoming Lip & Cheek Tint Guava Glow INGREDIENTS: Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Propylheptyl Caprylate, Octyldodecanol, Silica, C26-28 Alkyl Dimethicone, Hydrogenated Styrene/ Isoprene Copolymer, Althaea Officinalis (Marshmallow) Root Extract, Honey Extract\Mel\Extrait De Miel, Glycerin, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Water\Aqua\Eau, Dibutyl Lauroyl Glutamide, Citric Acid, Fragrance (Parfum), Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool, Limonene, Benzyl Salicylate, Citral, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Tocopherol, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Red 27 (CI 45410)
